alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 5:56PM CDT until August 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sulphur, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Carlyss, Buhler, and Edgerly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 12 and 30. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 7. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
